title: "Comparing room to room DDPCR data"
author: "Manogna"
date: "2024-07-12"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#load libraries
library(tidyverse)

swab_data_clean = read.csv("./data/processed_data/swab_data_clean.csv")

#create new table with location and count

room_to_room_ddpcr_comp = 
  swab_data_clean %>%
  filter(location == "light_switch"|location == "behind_bedroom_door") %>%
  filter(!(samp_id %in% paste0("s",13:20))) %>%
   select(location,room_id,UFT_m2) %>%
  filter(location == "behind_bedroom_door" | location == "light_switch")

# Load necessary libraries
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(broom)

# Perform the Kruskal-Wallis test
kruskal.test.result.ddpcr <- room_to_room_ddpcr_comp %>%
  group_by(location) %>%
  do(tidy(kruskal.test(UFT_m2 ~ room_id, data = .)))
```
